actions.text: Amendment SA 998 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 241.

Amendment SA 998 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8410-8412, S8414-8415; text: CR S8410) To modify the amount of the direct subsidy to be provided to qualified retiree prescription drug plans.
